metadata.title: CVE-2019-14531 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in The Sleuth Kit (TSK) 4.6.6. There is an out ofbounds read on iso9660 while parsing System Use Sharing Protocol data infs/iso9660.c.

criterions.comment: sleuthkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
